Title: Authorizes and directs the office of children and family services to conduct a study on the family assessment response program
Summary: Authorizes and directs the office of children and family services to conduct a study on the family assessment response program; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing and directing the office of children and family services to conduct a study on the family assessment response program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
